meanings.definition: The quality or state of being outlandish.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's outlandishness caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The outlandishness of his ideas made him stand out in the group.
meanings.sent3: The outlandishness of the situation made us all burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The outlandishness of the proposal was like a splash of color in a dull room.
meanings.sent5: The outlandishness of the costume made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being bizarre or unconventional.
meanings.sent1: The outlandishness of the movie plot left us all in awe.
meanings.sent2: She embraced the outlandishness of her style and rocked it with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The outlandishness of his taste in music always surprises me.
meanings.sent4: The outlandishness of the art installation challenged traditional norms.
meanings.sent5: The outlandishness of the recipe made it a viral sensation.
